abstract: By purchasing the company, Microsoft will have access to chips that, when combined with a digital camera, allow things like cars, toys and computers to perceive the world in three dimensions.
snippet: By purchasing the company, Microsoft will have access to chips that, when combined with a digital camera, allow things like cars, toys and computers to perceive the world in three dimensions.
lead_paragraph: 6:29 p.m. | Updated Microsoft said late Friday that it was buying Canesta, a small Silicon Valley company that specializes in gesture recognition technology.
